game.name: Fight Angel Special Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight Angel은 자신만의 캐릭터 꾸미기가 가능한 여성 격투게임입니다. 리얼한 가슴 연출이 가능한 물리엔진을 특징으로 의상 파괴 시스템도 갖추고 있습니다. Fight Angel에서 당신만의 파트너와 함께 도전자들을 격파해봅시다!이것은 스페셜 에디션입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight Angel is the girl fighting game with great customization functions with physical effects that make realistic boobs movements and clothing destruction systems. Let's fight the challenger with your partner! This is a special edition of Fight Angel.

reviewHighlights.text: Listen This game is jank as hell, but it is very clearly made by people who really care about fighting games & doing cool shit in fighting games. Ther...
Fight Angel Special Edition is a striking example of how a small-scale fighting game can distinguish itself through personality, eccentricity, and una...
